name: AC Pro M-Series AC – 3 Ton – 14–15 SEER2 – 80% Furnace
description: Reliable, affordable comfort. Single-stage scroll compressor with proven durability, compact condenser design, and ENERGY STAR® efficiency up to 15 SEER2. Factory run-tested for reliability. Includes a 10-year parts and compressor warranty with NO registration required. Equipment only; professional installation required.

name: AC Pro X-Series Inverter Heat Pump – 4 Ton – 17.5 SEER2
description: High-efficiency inverter-driven heat pump delivering quieter operation, smoother temperatures, and improved humidity control. ENERGY STAR® rated up to 18 SEER2. Designed for consistent comfort in extreme heat or cold. Includes a 10-year parts and compressor warranty with NO registration required. Equipment only.

name: AC Pro Z-Series Inverter System – 5 Ton – Up to 19 SEER2
description: Premium inverter system with side-discharge design for reduced footprint and low sound levels. Variable-speed operation delivers precise comfort and high efficiency. Smart voltage detection (115V/230V) simplifies retrofits. Includes a 10-year parts and compressor warranty with NO registration required. Equipment only.

name: AC Pro P-Series Packaged Heat Pump – 5 Ton – Up to 18 SEER2
description: All-in-one packaged inverter heat pump offering quiet operation, high efficiency, and simplified installation. ENERGY STAR® qualified with advanced inverter technology for consistent comfort. Includes a 10-year parts and compressor warranty with NO registration required. Equipment only.

name: Split System Change-Out (2–3 Ton)
description: Remove and replace existing split system. Includes standard reconnection and base installation materials.

name: Split System Change-Out (4–5 Ton)
description: Remove and replace existing split system. Includes standard reconnection and base installation materials.

name: Package Unit Change-Out (2–3 Ton)
description: Remove and replace existing package unit. Includes standard reconnection and roof sealing.

name: Package Unit Change-Out (4–5 Ton)
description: Remove and replace existing package unit. Includes standard reconnection and roof sealing.

name: Tight Attic
description: Installation performed in limited attic access conditions.

name: Tight Attic – Build in Place
description: System must be assembled in attic.

name: Weekend Install – Saturday
description: Installation performed on Saturday.

name: Weekend Install – Sunday
description: Installation performed on Sunday.

name: Package Unit Stand
description: Prefabricated package unit stand.

name: Side-by-Side Radius Elbow
description: Side-by-side duct radius elbow.

name: Twist Radius Elbow
description: Twist duct radius elbow.

name: Condenser Only Change-Out
description: Remove and replace outdoor condenser only.

name: Coil Only Change-Out (Upflow / Horizontal)
description: Remove and replace indoor evaporator coil only.

name: Coil Only Change-Out (Attic / Package)
description: Remove and replace evaporator coil in attic or package system.

name: Standard Crane Service
description: 1 Hour Standard distance crane service.

name: Disconnect + Whip Replacement (Residential)
description: Replace existing outdoor disconnect and liquid-tight whip for safe, code-compliant power connection. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Disconnect Replacement (3-Phase Commercial)
description: Replace 3‑phase fusible disconnect for commercial equipment (materials only; fusing per spec). Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Contactor Replacement (Any Size/Pole)
description: Replace failed contactor to ensure reliable power delivery to compressor and fan. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Transformer Replacement (24V Control)
description: Replace failed control transformer to restore 24V operations. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Relay Replacement (Any Type)
description: Replace defective relay to restore proper system control. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Circuit Breaker Replacement (2‑Pole 40A Residential)
description: Replace outdoor AC circuit breaker (2‑pole) for safe, code-compliant protection. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Control Board Replacement (OEM / Defrost / Furnace)
description: Replace failed control board and transfer wiring to restore system operation. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: TXV Replacement (3.5–5 Ton, OEM) – Refrigerant Not Included
description: Replace thermal expansion valve and test operation. Refrigerant recovery/charge billed separately. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Leak Search – Basic (Electronic/Nitrogen, up to 1.5 hrs)
description: Perform electronic/nitrogen leak search to locate refrigerant leak source. Includes 1-year labor warranty on workmanship (no refrigerant included). Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Leak Search – Comprehensive (Hard-to-Reach / Attic / Lineset Tracing)
description: Comprehensive leak search including hard-to-access areas and line-set tracing. Includes 1-year labor warranty on workmanship (no refrigerant included). Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Leak Repair – Minor Brazed Repair (Accessible, Single Point)
description: Brazed repair at a single accessible leak point with nitrogen purge. Includes 1-year labor warranty on workmanship (no refrigerant included). Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Leak Repair – Evaporator Coil (Braze/Pinhole In-Place)
description: Spot repair of evaporator coil leak in place (where feasible). Includes nitrogen purge. 1-year labor warranty on workmanship (no refrigerant included). Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Leak Repair – Line Set (Patch/Splice up to 6 ft)
description: Repair line set leak with patch/splice and reinsulate up to 6 ft. Includes 1-year labor warranty on workmanship (no refrigerant included). Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Condenser Coil Cleaning – Standard (Ground-Level)
description: Rinse and detergent clean of outdoor coil; straighten fins as needed. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty on used chemicals. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Condenser Coil Cleaning – Deep Chemical
description: Heavy-duty chemical cleaning with panel removal as needed. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty on used chemicals. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Evaporator Coil Cleaning – Accessible (Clean in Place)
description: Clean evaporator coil in place; includes drain pan rinse and trap flush. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty on used chemicals. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Evaporator Coil Cleaning – Not Easily Accessible
description: Clean evaporator coil in tight/attic or vertical applications. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty on used chemicals. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Evaporator Coil – Pull & Clean (Refrigerant Not Included)
description: Remove, clean, and reinstall evaporator coil. Refrigerant recovery/evacuation/recharge billed separately. Includes 1-year labor warranty on workmanship. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Blower Wheel Cleaning – In Place (Light)
description: Clean blower wheel and housing in place; balance and test airflow. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty on used chemicals. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Blower Wheel Cleaning – Remove & Clean (Heavy)
description: Remove and deep-clean blower wheel; reinstall and rebalance. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty on used chemicals. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Condensate Drain Flush – Basic
description: Flush and clear primary condensate drain and trap; add biocide as needed. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty on used chemicals. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Condensate Pan Treatment – Tabs
description: Install pan treatment tabs to inhibit algae growth and odors. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty where applicable.

name: Igniter Replacement (Hot Surface)
description: Replace failed hot surface igniter to restore furnace ignition. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Igniter Replacement (Spark Igniter)
description: Replace spark igniter assembly for reliable furnace startup. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Flame Sensor Replacement
description: Replace failed flame sensor to ensure proper flame detection and safe furnace operation. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Pressure Switch Replacement
description: Replace defective pressure switch to restore safe furnace operation. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Inducer Motor Replacement
description: Replace draft inducer motor to restore proper venting and combustion airflow. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Gas Valve Replacement
description: Replace defective furnace gas valve and test combustion. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Limit Switch Replacement
description: Replace failed high-limit switch for safe furnace operation. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Rollout Switch Replacement
description: Replace rollout switch to protect against unsafe combustion. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Surge Protector Installation
description: Install surge protection device to safeguard HVAC system from voltage spikes. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Float Switch Installation
description: Install float safety switch to shut system down in case of condensate overflow. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Hard Start Kit Installation
description: Install hard start kit to provide extra starting torque for compressor. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Soft Start Kit Installation
description: Install soft start kit for compressor to reduce inrush current and noise. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: System Flush / Line Set Flush
description: Flush and clean refrigeration line set with approved chemical flush. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Line Set Insulation Replacement (up to 10 ft)
description: Replace deteriorated insulation on refrigerant line set (up to 10 ft). Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Blower Motor Replacement (PSC)
description: Replace evaporator fan motor (PSC type) with universal equivalent. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Evaporator Fan Motor Replacement (ECM)
description: Replace ECM blower motor with OEM equivalent. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Condenser Fan Motor Replacement (PSC)
description: Replace condenser fan motor (PSC) with universal equivalent. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Condenser Fan Motor Replacement (ECM)
description: Replace condenser fan motor (ECM) with OEM equivalent. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Capillary Tube / Metering Device Replacement
description: Replace failed capillary tube or metering device. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Filter Drier Replacement – Liquid Line
description: Replace liquid line filter drier to ensure refrigerant cleanliness. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Filter Drier Replacement – Suction Line
description: Replace suction line filter drier to protect compressor. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Service Valve Replacement
description: Replace leaking refrigerant service valve. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Defrost Relay Replacement
description: Replace failed defrost relay for heat pump system. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Two-Stage Contactor / Relay Replacement
description: Replace two-stage contactor/relay to restore staging control. Includes 1-year labor warranty and full manufacturer warranty.

name: Refrigerant Recovery (Per System, No Recharge)
description: Recover refrigerant from system for service/repair. Disposal per EPA regulations. Includes 1-year labor warranty on workmanship.

name: Refrigerant Recharge (Labor Only, Per Pound Billed Separately)
description: Recharge system with refrigerant (refrigerant billed per pound separately). Includes 1-year labor warranty on workmanship.

name: Tune Up
description: Comprehensive system inspection and service to ensure peak performance, efficiency, and reliability. Includes: checking refrigerant pressures and temperatures, testing electrical components and safety controls, inspecting air filter and duct connections, tightening connections, lubricating moving parts (as applicable), and verifying proper system operation. Recommended bi-annually to extend equipment life, improve comfort, and reduce risk of costly breakdowns.

name: 4-Ton M Series 14.3 SEER2 AC/Coil & 80%  Furnace
description: Includes removal of existing equipment and installation of a new AC Pro M Series 4-ton straight-cool condenser (14.3 SEER2) with matching evaporator coil and 80% AFUE low-NOx gas furnace. System uses eco-friendly R454B refrigerant; matching coil sized for 4-ton capacity. Includes supply plenum, gas flex connector and fittings, flue pipe and miscellaneous installation materials. System will be evacuated, pressure tested, charged to factory specification, and run-tested for proper airflow, temperature differential, superheat and subcool. Condenser/coil carry 10-year parts and compressor warranty (no registration required); furnace includes 10-year heat exchanger warranty and 1-year labor warranty.

name: AC Tune-Up
description: Comprehensive air conditioning maintenance including: check refrigerant levels, clean condenser coil, inspect electrical connections, test capacitors, check amp draws, verify temperature split, inspect drain line, check thermostat operation. Recommended bi-annually.

name: Furnace Tune-Up
description: Comprehensive furnace maintenance including: inspect heat exchanger, test ignition system, check gas pressure, verify safety controls, inspect flue/venting, clean burners, check blower operation. Recommended annually before heating season.

name: Heat Pump Tune-Up
description: Comprehensive heat pump maintenance including: check refrigerant charge, test defrost cycle, inspect reversing valve operation, clean coils, verify auxiliary heat function, check electrical components.

name: Mini Split Tune-Up
description: Maintenance service for ductless mini split system including: clean indoor and outdoor coils, check refrigerant, clean filters, verify drainage, test remote operation.

name: Package Unit Tune-Up
description: Complete maintenance for rooftop or ground-level package unit. Includes both heating and cooling inspection.

name: Additional System Tune-Up
description: Tune-up for each additional system at same location when performed same visit.

name: Contactor - Single Pole
description: Replace failed single-pole contactor to restore power delivery. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Contactor - Double Pole
description: Replace failed double-pole contactor for proper compressor and fan operation. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Contactor - Three Pole (Commercial)
description: Replace commercial 3-pole contactor. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Relay - Time Delay
description: Replace time delay relay to restore proper system sequencing. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Relay - Fan
description: Replace fan relay for proper blower operation. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Relay - Potential/Start
description: Replace potential or start relay for compressor. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Relay - Sequencer (Electric Heat)
description: Replace heat sequencer relay for electric furnace/heat strip staging. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Transformer - 24V Control
description: Replace failed control transformer to restore 24V operations. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Transformer - Multi-Tap
description: Replace multi-tap transformer for variable voltage requirements. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Disconnect + Whip - Residential
description: Replace outdoor disconnect and liquid-tight whip for safe, code-compliant power connection. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Disconnect - 3-Phase Commercial
description: Replace 3-phase fusible disconnect for commercial equipment. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Circuit Breaker - 2-Pole 30-50A
description: Replace HVAC circuit breaker for safe, code-compliant protection. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Circuit Breaker - 60A+
description: Replace high-amperage circuit breaker. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Surge Protector - HVAC
description: Install surge protection device to safeguard HVAC system from voltage spikes. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Electrical Wiring Repair - Minor
description: Repair of faulty low-voltage or high-voltage wiring (up to 1 hour). Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Electrical Wiring Repair - Major
description: Extensive wiring repair including wire replacement, junction boxes, or multiple connections. Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Thermostat Wire Run - New
description: Run new thermostat wire from equipment to thermostat location (up to 50 ft). Includes 1-year labor warranty.

name: Blower Motor - PSC (Universal)

name: Reinstall
description: Reinstall vertical air handler or furnace/coil. Does not include necessary refrigerant,

name: 3 Ton M Series 14.3 SEER2 AC/Coil & 80%  Furnace
description: Includes removal of existing equipment and installation of a new AC Pro M Series 3-ton straight-cool condenser (14.3 SEER2) with matching evaporator coil and 80% AFUE low-NOx gas furnace. System uses eco-friendly R454B refrigerant; matching coil sized for 3-ton capacity. Includes supply plenum, gas flex connector and fittings, flue pipe and miscellaneous installation materials. System will be evacuated, pressure tested, charged to factory specification, and run-tested for proper airflow, temperature differential, superheat and subcool. Condenser/coil carry 10-year parts and compressor warranty (no registration required); furnace includes 10-year heat exchanger warranty and 1-year labor warranty.

name: Duct Cleaning Inspection
description: Ensure your home’s air stays clean and healthy with our Duct Cleaning Inspection. We thoroughly assess your ductwork for dust, debris, and buildup, helping improve air quality, HVAC efficiency, and comfort while identifying potential issues early.
